title: DIY Bluetooth Mechanical Keyboard
description: This custom-designed DIY Bluetooth mechanical keyboard features hot-swappable switches, USB-C, a slide potentiometer, built-in NFC, and a 6° ergonomic tilt with wrist rest.

title: Hackpad
description: A DIY custom macropad built using a Xiao RP2040 for Hack Club's Highway to Undercity event.

title: DogFace PCB Art Keychain
description: A dog-shaped interactive PCB art keychain with LEDs, buttons, a vibration motor, and a custom outline — made with KiCad.

title: Smart Light-Based Canopy System
description: An eco-friendly smart home prototype using a light dependent resistor (LDR) and Arduino Uno.

title: Smart WiFi Fish Feeder
description: A smart WiFi controlled fish feeder device built using an ESP32 devboard and a SG90 servo.

title: SoundTune
description: SoundTune is an Android application that automatically adjusts media volume based on ambient noise levels for a seamless audio experience.
